title: What Is Heel-Toe Drop, and Does It Matter for Runners?
description: We’ve previously written about why people shouldn’t overthink their running shoes. At the same time, knowing your body and finding the right shoe fit could make the difference between lacing up for a run and staying home.

title: Stop Sharing Tinder Screenshots on the Internet, You Monsters
description: “The internet has a privacy problem,” isn’t a statement that’s likely to shock you. But just because we’ve all lost a lot of what we traditionally think of as privacy, doesn’t mean we need to resort to bad behavior. Case in point: If you’re sharing screenshots of people’s dating app profiles, you need to stop.

title: This Is How You Load a Piping Bag

description: Cardamom deserves more love as a baking spice. It’s unique yet versatile, warming and bold, and fit for both sweet and savory foods. title: Now Anyone Can Use This AI That Will Draw Anything You Tell It To
description: Tech is awesome, but let’s be honest: Sometimes it gets a bit boring. title: Comedian Mo Amer Talks About Writing a Show for Everyone
How Many Cups of Coffee You Should Drink Per Day, According to 'Science'
description: A study that’s in the news right now claims that people who drink two to three cups of coffee per day live longer than people who avoid coffee. So should we all be drinking two to three cups? Not necessarily. Let’s take a look at where these numbers come from.

title: Your Hot Oatmeal Needs Frozen Berries
description: Weekday breakfasts have to meet three major criteria to be considered “good.” They must be easy and quick to prepare, filling enough to keep you going until lunch, and tasty enough that you don’t start your day off on a depressing note.
